docs.title: ezapi-sysaid
docs.text: A Python wrapper for SysAid REST API

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
from sysaid import SysAid

host = "..."
username = "..."
password = "..."

s = SysAid(host, username, password)

See detailed usages at Endpoints page.
